translations.htmlTitle: MyvoteEOS - The EOS BP Proxy and DAO to replace vote buying

homePage.htmlTitle: MyvoteEOS - The EOS BP Proxy and DAO to replace vote buying
homePage.secondaryText: Reestablish legitimacy and accountability in blockchain governance by uncompromised consensus of all EOS holders on and off chain.
homePage.placeholder: Enter your email to join the movement and receive intro PDF.
homePage.eligibility: Only those BPs who fulfill the criteria below will qualify to be included in the MyvoteEOS BP whitelist.
homePage.mailSuccess: You joined the movement! you'll soon receive intro PDF deck!

homeText.joinLabel: Join the movement and receive intro PDF deck.
homeText.text2: Do you keep your EOS on centralized exchanges?
homeText.text3: Are you an on-chain account holder?
homeText.text7: The EOS based proxy facilitates the transition into a truly democratic based chain that is free from Pareto control by voting for BP’s that do not engage with direct vote rebate.
homeText.text8: EOS came with the vision of becoming a governed blockchain.
homeText.text9: But without no-vote-buy rule, DPoS isn’t much different than all PoW or PoS in which the consensus is captured by the pareto distribution.
homeText.text10: EOS is on the verge of becoming the only blockchain that is free from the grip of pareto distribution with fractal democracy.
homeText.text11: But it needs support from the BPs.
homeText.text12: The MyvoteEOS whitelist of BPs will be utilized by the Eden Smart Proxy in its determination of which BPs can receive its vote.
homeText.text13: The core function of MyvoteEOS is to be a self-regulatory body from the EOS community.
homeText.text14: It will ensure the integrity and the accountability of the BPs it selects to whitelists, ensuring that they represent the will of the community.
homeText.text20: This will be achieved through holding regular check-up calls with the pledged BPs, reviewing their finances, and monitoring their activities. The MyvoteEOS whitelist will represent a new integrity standard for EOS BPs.
homeText.text15: Heal the governance with greater alignment of interests
homeText.text16: No engagement in vote compromise in any form. (operating our own proxy with direct APR, buying votes from 3rd party exchanges or proxies.)
homeText.text17: Providing public financial and operation reports on a regular basis.
homeText.text18: No more than one BP with the same ownership.
homeText.text19: Agree that votes can be taken out at any time if engaging with vote compromise.

homePage.loginWarning: Please login to delegate your vote
homePage.twitterContent: {{ exchange }} Please support %23EOS token holders' right to have their voice heard by delegating their %24EOS votes to the %23MyvoteEOS proxy. More info: https://myvoteeos.com
